metatags.title: Colored Yarn | Hitesh Enterprise
metatags.description: Vibrant dope dyed and package dyed colored yarns in polyester and nylon — ideal for fashion, home textiles, and specialty fabrics.
metatags.keywords: Colored Yarn, Dope Dyed Yarn, Package Dyed Yarn, Colored Polyester, Yarn Shades, Hitesh Enterprise

Dope Dyed.short_description: Pre-colored yarn with pigments added during polymer melt spinning, ensuring excellent color fastness, uniformity, and environmental benefits.

benefits.Cost-Efficient: Eliminates post-dyeing steps and reduces pollution

applications: Apparel: Sportswear, uniforms, casual wear, socks
Home Furnishing: Curtains, upholstery, bed linen, carpets
Industrial: Luggage fabrics, geo-textiles, flags, tents
Fashion Accessories: Bags, belts, scarves, shoe uppers

Conventional Dyed.short_description: Yarn dyed after spinning using high-pressure vessels; ideal for custom shades and small batch production.

key_specifications.Filament Options: 24F – 288F (FDY, DTY, ATY, Spun Yarn, Textured Yarn)
